response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which I believe would significantly benefit your business operations. Given its high value and potential impact on your endeavors, I am extending an exclusive offer to you. For a limited time, you have the opportunity to acquire this exceptional product at a special price of $12,500. This offer is tailored to recognize your discerning taste and commitment to excellence in your field. Should you choose to accept, not only will you secure a valuable asset at an advantageous rate, but you'll also be part of our esteemed clientele. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to contribute to your success. If you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out.", "product_price": 12500}
